Introduction.content:
Fatuma wanted a motorcycle to carry her tomatoes to the market every morning.

She found the cheapest one in the whole city. It was old, red, and very ugly.

The seller said, “Only 200,000 shillings, madam!”

Fatuma paid cash and rode away happy.

She did not know the bike could talk… and it had a very rude mouth.

Chapter 1.chapter_title: First Ride – The Bike Opens Its Mouth
Chapter 1.content:
Fatuma started the engine.

The motorcycle shouted very loud:


“Hey lady! Your dress looks like a potato sack!”

![Fatuma shocked on red motorcycle](https://picsum.photos/seed/fatuma-shocked-bike/800/600)

Everyone in the street turned and laughed.

Fatuma’s face became red like the bike.

Chapter 2.chapter_title: The Bike Becomes a Love Expert
Chapter 2.content:
Next day, Fatuma’s boyfriend called her.

She answered on speaker while riding.

The bike screamed:

“Dump him! He is shorter than my kickstand!”

![Bike shouting at phone](https://picsum.photos/seed/bike-yelling-phone/800/600)

The boyfriend heard everything and cried.

They broke up in five seconds.

Chapter 3.chapter_title: Traffic Police Stop the Talking Bike
Chapter 3.content:
A police officer stopped Fatuma for no helmet.

The bike shouted at the officer:

“Mind your own business, big belly!”

![Police officer angry at motorcycle](https://picsum.photos/seed/police-angry-bike/800/600)

The officer got so mad he forgot to write a ticket.

He just walked away shaking his head.

Chapter 4.chapter_title: The Bike Goes Viral on TikTok
Chapter 4.content:
Someone recorded the bike shouting and posted the video.

In two days: 5 million views!

The account name became @AngryRedBike

People came from far to hear the bike insult them.

![Crowd laughing around red motorcycle](https://picsum.photos/seed/crowd-laughing-bike/800/600)

Fatuma started charging 500 shillings per insult.

She became rich.

Chapter 5.chapter_title: The Day the Bike Fell in Love
Chapter 5.content:
One morning the bike saw Fatuma putting on lipstick.

It spoke in a sweet voice:

“Fatuma… will you marry me?”

![Motorcycle with heart eyes](https://picsum.photos/seed/bike-heart-eyes/800/600)

Fatuma got scared and sold the bike the same day…

to her ex-boyfriend.

Now he rides it every day and cries.

Conclusion.content:
Fatuma bought a quiet, normal motorcycle with the money.

She still sells tomatoes, but now she smiles all day.

![Fatuma happy on new quiet bike](https://picsum.photos/seed/fatuma-happy-newbike/800/600)

The rude red bike?

It still insults people… but now it insults her ex every morning.

Best revenge ever!

The end.
